new_generated_rule_explanation: The rule 'incorrect-async-method-signature' checks all classes and their methods. If a method has the @Async annotation, it checks the return type of the method. The return type should be either 'void', 'Future', 'ListenableFuture', or 'CompletableFuture'. If the return type is not one of these, it asserts an error message indicating the incorrect return type for the @Async method in the class.
